source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a static, wide-angle scenery shot of Paris at night. The brightly illuminated Eiffel Tower is the central focus, standing out against the dark sky. The sprawling city below is a vast expanse of twinkling lights, but there is no camera movement or significant motion within the scene.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

The brightly illuminated Eiffel Tower is the central focus, standing out against the dark sky. The sprawling city below is a vast expanse of twinkling lights, enhancing the serene atmosphere of the scene.
